name: Valuable thing
description:
Story
You're going on a trip with your friend to a space station. There you meet other characters and choosing how you'll behave to them. When you find out that your friend is missing in a place, that isn't as good as you thought so, you're going to search for her. You'll have to choose which character you'll trust and who you'll cooperate with.

Note
The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo version which includes only the first chapter of the game, for now.
You're playing this game from a first-person perspective so you're not playing as one of the characters.
- At The End of the chapter you can click on a button Title and then button yes and you'll get to the main menu. :)

Plans
This game does not yet have the whole art and looks. There would also be audio music. In the future, there would be around 5 characters with which you can interact.
Later you can expect more gameplay in the future in the demo version and I'll fix typos.
